name: inVeRse (Epsi)
description:
You are in a strange forest, things are not behaving as they should....It even look like they are doing the exact opposite

In this game you must overcome several obstacles by using elements in your environment. However, in this strange forest, to improve your situation, you must act like you wanted to worsen your situation.

Controls:

- Grip or Trigger to grab object or to teleport

- Use the stick to turn around

- You can teleport only on the luminous blue platforms

- Your hand ray is white when it point toward and object you can grab or a place where you can teleport

This game is a submission for the VR super jam (theme: Opposite)

3D assets from SYNTY STUDIOS (from 2019 humble bundle)
